title: Bio Tea Detox Energy
cleaned_text: Copyright © 2012 - 2021 NaturalniProdukti.com Bio Tea Detox Energy, 12 packets Lemongrass, dandelion, lacrim. Revitalizing, Acute, Energizing Sometimes, the body and the soul yearn for internal purification to reach a new source of energy, strength and cheerfulness. Enjoy it with the support of: bitterly sweet dandelion stimulates metabolism, nettle is a light diuretic, and sour lemon refreshes the body and mind. Effective delight in Ayurvedic style. Ingredients: lemongrass * (25%), dandelion * (18%), lavender * (11%), ginger *, cinnamon *, myrtle *, peppermint *, lemongrass *, nettle *, turmeric * * bio certified product Origin: Germany Brand: Yogi Organic
